differences.expected:
Cellar
You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a
crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is
unclimbable.
differences.actual:
The trap door crashes shut, and you hear someone barring it.
Cellar
You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.
Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.

differences.expected:
You are carrying:
  A brass lantern (providing light)
  An elvish sword
  A glass bottle
    A quantity of water
  A brown sack
    A lunch
    A clove of garlic
  A leaflet
differences.actual:
You are carrying:
  A leaflet
  A brown sack
    A lunch
    A clove of garlic
  A glass bottle
    A quantity of water
  A sword
  A brass lantern

differences.expected:
East of Chasm
You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. A
narrow passage goes north, and the path you are on continues to the east.
differences.actual:
East of Chasm
You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. A narrow passage goes north, and the path you are on continues to the east.
Your sword is no longer glowing.

differences.expected:
Gallery
This is an art gallery. Most of the paintings which were here have been stolen
by vandals with exceptional taste. The vandals left through either the north or
west exits.
Hanging on a wall is a beautiful painting by a neglected artist. It is a
portrait of an elven maid with a wistful expression.
differences.actual:
Gallery
This is an art gallery. Most of the paintings have been stolen by vandals with exceptional taste. The vandals left through either the north or west exits.
Fortunately, there is still one chance for you to be a vandal, for on the far wall is a painting of unparalleled beauty.

differences.command: open mailbox. take leaflet. read it.
differences.expected:
Opening the small mailbox reveals a leaflet.
Taken.
"WELCOME TO ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore
some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. No computer should be
without one!"
differences.actual: You can't see any mailbox take leaflet read it here!
You are empty-handed.
You can't see any leaflet then take leaflet here!
The small mailbox is closed.

West of House
You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front
door.
There is a small mailbox here.
You are empty-handed.
The small mailbox is closed.
There is no command to repeat.
There is no command to repeat.
I don't know the word "testsave".
I don't know the word "testsave".

differences.expected:
West of House
You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front
door.
There is a small mailbox here.
differences.actual:
South of House
You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.
A small leaflet is on the ground.
You are empty-handed.

differences.expected:
